item.title: Continuous Deployment of Jupyter Notebooks
item.description: This is a guide on how to use AWS CodePipeline to continuously deploy Jupyter notebooks to an S3-backed static website. Overview Since I started using EMR Studio, I’ve been making more use of Jupyter notebooks as scratch pads and often want to be able to easily share the results of my research. I hunted around for a few different solutions and while there are some good ones like nbconvert and jupytext, I wanted something a bit simpler and off-the-shelf.
